text: Probably one of the best coaches in the marina especially for beginners!! Most of my friends were able to let go of the rope on the first session wakesurfing?!?? Boat is clean and well taken care of too. Thanks coach Wilson :)
Wilson is one of the best instructors I have met. Patient and clear in coaching. Been out with him a few times. Highly recommended to engage him for wake surfing!
Wilson is a great coach! He is meticulous, patient and provides good advice at all levels. Look for him if you are looking for a fun time wakesurfing/wakeboarding.
Wilson was great. He was friendly, and on time and gave us really helpful tips for wake surfing. I managed to improve a lot in the session that we had.
Awesome time learning how to wakesurf. Great for all levels of riding. Friendly instructor, clear and helpful instructions! Would recommend for anyone looking for a good time. !
